com.giisoo.framework.web

类 Module

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.giisoo.framework.web.Module

  • public class Module
extends Object
    module includes: a module.ini, a group of model/view/images/css/js/language, etc. and it will handle the request, if not found the handler in the module, then will let the parent to handle it the module organized as a chain, the home module will handler first, if found then stop, else parent or parent's parent this purpose of module is reuse the module with only changing of configuration file
    作者:
    yjiang

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static org.apache.commons.configuration.Configuration _conf
      configuration
      static GClassLoader classLoader
      module class loader
      static Module home
      the default home module
      int id
      the id of the module, MUST unique, and also is a sequence of the loading: biggest first
